statements: DELETE FROM transportation_schedule WHERE route_id = 101 AND departure_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transportation_schedule WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus' AND carbon_emissions > 50;
DELETE FROM transportation_routes WHERE route_name = 'Route A' AND route_distance > 100;
DELETE FROM stops WHERE route_id = 1 AND stop_order = 3;
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE schedule_id = 100 AND route_id = 5;
DELETE FROM Route WHERE route_name = 'Express Route';
DELETE FROM Connection WHERE station_from_id = 3 AND station_to_id = 7;
